content.raw: It would be useful to be able to add a time delay parameter to all sensors. This could be generic and just be a FIFO buffer that is dynamically created to store until the current timestamp is >= the buffered packet timestamp. The tricky part is if the publishing rate is 10 Hz, and the time delay is 0.05 seconds, then you really want to publish the delayed packet in between measurement updates. So some sort of scheduling would have to take place.
